institution: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
award_title: PFI (MCA): High-Throughput Portable Biosensors for Detecting Toxins and Monitoring Health
subject: Your grad students' biosensor work
body:
Hi Ryan,

I saw your work on portable biosensors for toxin detection and thought about the students and postdocs building the AI/ML models and testing protocols in your lab.

I'm building Ouro, a platform for sharing computational tools and datasets in a way that's actually usable, not just a zip file in supplementary materials.

When your students publish tools that other labs can actually use, it becomes a real career assetâ€”something concrete they can point to on the job market.

Would a 15-minute call be useful to see if it fits your workflow?

Best,

Matt
Founder
https://ouro.foundation
